products.title: Lenovo ThinkCentre M710q Tiny, 7th Gen Intel Core i5, 16GB RAM, 2TB SSD Storage, Windows 10Pro
products.body_html:
Processor Specs:
  • 7th Generation Intel® Core™ i5-7500T Processor
  • Processor Number : 7200U
  • Cache : 6 MB
  • Speed: 2.70 GHz
  • Max Turbo Frequency: 3.3 GHz
  • # of Cores: 4
  • Processor Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 630

Memory and Storag:
  • Memory Type: 16GB DDR4
  • Storage Type: 2TB SSD

Ports and Other Specs:
  • Front ports: 2 x USB 3.1
  • Rear ports: 4 x USB 2.0
  • 1 x ethernet (RJ-45), two 
  • 2 x DisplayPort
  • 1 x microphone (3.5mm), 1 x headphone / microphone combo jack
  • Integrated Wireless Network Adapter


Features:

  • CSD QC Tested & Approved
  • Microsoft Windows 10 Professional 64bit
    • Microsoft Office365 (1 Year Subscription)
    • (Word, Excel, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher & Power Point)
 

 

  • 3 Year Parts and Labour Onsite Warranty
  • Webroot SecureAnywhere Managed Antivirus
  • 1 Year Subscription and Support
